My Work

Neil is a creative entrepreneurial visionary, with strategic “out of the box” thinking. He is recognized as one of the leaders of Balance Sheet Optimization having authored 41 White Papers on the subject as well as a book "Secrets of Balance Sheet Optimization" available on Kindle in all formats from all major bookstores. Amazon ranked his book #17 of their Top 100 in the genre of Functional Analysis. In October 2018, Neil started Trading Oil. He did so well at it that he wrote a book on the subject. The book was “How I turned $38,673 into $1,129,030 in fourteen weeks by Spread-Betting Oil!” He was willing to share his secrets with the world, not worried about competition since only Neil possessed his unique instincts.
